zero_p0_errors.detail: 3 P0 errors on home path (ModuleLoadError: getFeaturedCarriers, getRecentHires, getPublicStats from publicStatsService.jsw). 1 P0 on app_flow (404 page not found — /apply and /quick-apply both return 404).

all_critical_selectors_visible.detail: home: full content rendered (hero, FAQ, footer). ai_matcher: iframe fully rendered with form fields, AI chat, voice agent. driver_entry: auth-gated (Sign Up modal — expected). carrier_entry: auth-gated (Sign Up modal — expected). app_flow: 404 (no selectors to check).

all_pages_reached_ready_state.detail: 4/5 paths reached ready state. app_flow (/apply) returned 404 — page does not exist.

zero_network_500_errors.detail: Zero 4xx/5xx network failures across all LMDR-specific XHR/fetch requests on all 5 paths. All requests returned 200 or 204.

screenshots_captured.detail: 5/5 screenshots captured: home.png, ai_matcher.png, driver_entry.png, carrier_entry.png, app_flow.png

zero_velo_worker_fatal_errors.detail: 3 Velo ModuleLoadError on home path: 'Failed to load featured carriers', 'Failed to load recent placements', 'Failed to load platform stats'. All from publicStatsService.jsw backend web methods.

home.notes: Page renders fully but 3 data-loading backend calls fail with ModuleLoadError. Suppressible warnings: Meta pixel, Tailwind CDN prod, Wix preload resource.

ai_matcher.notes: Full iframe render: carrier matching form, AI assistant chat overlay, voice agent, OCR handler, accordion system. PostMessage bridge verified (ping/pong/pageReady handshake). All warnings suppressible (Meta pixel, Tailwind CDN, 2x Wix preload).

driver_entry.notes: Sign Up modal displayed — expected behavior for unauthenticated visitor. Page reached ready state (auth wall rendered correctly). Full verification requires authenticated session.

carrier_entry.notes: Sign Up modal displayed — expected behavior for unauthenticated visitor. Page title: 'Welcome Aboard | LMDR Driver Recruitment Process Explained'. Full verification requires authenticated session.

app_flow.notes: Both /apply and /quick-apply return 404. The app_flow critical path URL does not exist. The actual application form is hosted externally on JotForm (https://form.jotform.com/250845294380057) — linked from footer 'Apply Now' buttons. The critical path definition needs updating to reflect the actual application entry point.

action_items.issue: publicStatsService.jsw ModuleLoadError — getFeaturedCarriers, getRecentHires, getPublicStats all fail
action_items.recommendation: Check publicStatsService.jsw deployment status. These are likely Wix backend web methods that aren't published or have import errors.
Either create the /apply page in Wix Editor, or update the critical path definition to point to the actual application entry (JotForm link or /drivers page).

action_items.issue: Auth-gated pages cannot be fully verified without login
action_items.recommendation: Run authenticated Evidence Pack session (log into Wix in Chrome first) to verify post-login content rendering.
